document.full_text: a tornado tore through tuscaloosa, ala., destroying homes and buildings. at least 58 people were killed in the state on wednesday, and 14 more died across the south.
document.title: scores die in storms across south; tornado ravages city
lines_and_colors: a tornado tore through tuscaloosa, ala., destroying homes and buildings. at least 58 people were killed in the state on wednesday, and 14 more died across the south.
